column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=First I run plug the bath and run the hot water .
#text=Then I take off my jacket and socks .
#text=Next I take off my shirt and pants .
#text=One the bath is full I enter it .
#text=Usually it is a bit hot for me at first so I go in slowly .
#text=Once I 'm in I lie down and think about what happened to me during the day , the things I did , and what I plan on doing tomorrow .
#text=Then I soap myself up , scrub myself down and make sure that I am nice and clean .
#text=When I get out I use that shower to rinse myself off and drain the bathwater .
#text=Then I grab a towel and use it to dry the water off of my body .
#text=Taking a bath is one of the most relaxing moments of my day .
